name: Love never change
description:
Hey Guys

Theme: Love is Blind

Controller: Mouse

Game Design: Those COUPLES in the game enjoy their love due to they never focus on the dangerous environments and other character. Your mission is try to protect the couples makes them love forever.

All the images and audios are made by ourselves~

Staff: Shanyin Liu(Game Design), Dan Zhu(Audio), Will(Code), Zheyuan Zhou & ZhengChao Wu(Art)

Further: Because this is our first game, art and game is not perfect. But we will update soon or later. Hopes you can have fun in there!
